paragraphs.body: To fire the cannon, the heavy power core containing a spirit vine sample was mechanically loaded into the barrel and, by running electrical currents through the vines, a focused beam of energy was generated. Although the cannon could contain the immense power of the energy beams, it contained small vital components, like a condenser, channeling ring, and distributor pin, that could cause the entire weapon to overload and explode when they were missing or damaged. To avoid malfunctions, the cannon was equipped with a manual override that can shut it down.

paragraphs.body: Due to its immense size and weight, the cannon was attached to the right arm of a mecha suit that stood over twenty-five stories high in order to allow for easy transportation; during the weapon's testing phase, however, it was transported via a rail system. The mecha suit, fashioned out of the metal taken from the domes that previously protected Zaofu, was operated with several levers and turning balls located in its cockpit. The head of the machine also featured scoped sight to facilitate the accuracy when taking aim. Due to the immense power of the spirit energy cannon, the mecha suit stabilized itself by holding its right arm with its left to avoid throwing off the cannon's aim by the weapon's drawback upon being fired.
